remarks: Property of a projective subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
psubspset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
psubspset.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
psubspset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
psubspset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
psubspi2N $p |- ( ( ( K e. D /\ X e. S /\ P e. A ) /\ ( Q e. X /\ R e. X /\ P .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) -> P e. X ) $.
